channel.title: Need help very new
channel.description:
So i use to play and loved testing servers and i juts recently got into coding them.
what i need to know is;
Im using Luckscape as a source. My current issue is for some items they go into the weapon slot when its a cape, or a whip in the arrow spot.(two examples.)
If you can provide me with a link on how to fix this or maybe tell me directly i would appreciate it.
Thank you for your time

item.title: Need help very new
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:4, topic:381706”]Use my Delta, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,466353.msg3410481.html#msg3410481
Great for beginners and there’s already some pretty cool stuff in there.[/quote]

Thank you very much.

Read full topic
